alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Ogle; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:28PM CDT until July 28 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ogle County in north central Illinois... Northern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... Southeastern Winnebago County in north central Illinois... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 928 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rockford Airport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockford, Genoa, Rockford Airport, Cherry Valley, Davis Junction, Kirkland, Kingston, New Milford, Monroe Center and Fairdale. Including the following interstate... I-39 between mile markers 112 and 122. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
